EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Compliance Week 2018
Learn and earn 20+ credits* Attendance certificates are issued to all attendees seeking continuing education credits for a variety of professional accreditations including CCEP, CPE, CLE, CFE, LPEC, CIA, and more. SAVE $300—REGISTER TODAY We have the most cutting-edge topics:
A Fireside Chat with Volkswagen: Lessons Learned and the Path Forward Ethics & Compliance and the Board of Directors Applications of AI and Machine Learning to Compliance Managing Conflict Through Disclosure How to Operationalize GDPR Compliance Challenges in Measuring Culture International Sanctions and Trade Compliance Best Practices Data Breaches and Crisis Management Planning Building a World-Class Communications and Training Program and more!
REGISTER NOW Extended early-bird—ends Jan 31. Ensure you have a seat at this must-attend session! Know someone who should be there? Forward this e-mail. *Certification boards have final authority on the acceptance of individual course credit. Compliance Week 2018 | May 21-23 | Washington, D.C.
THANK YOU TO OUR GENEROUS SPONSORS
You are subscribed as %%EMAIL%% To unsubscribe from promotional messages please click here. For unsubscribe problems, please reply to this e-mail.
All Compliance Week promotional emails are sent from the domain "mail.complianceweek.com". When configuring e-mail or spam filter rules, please use this domain name.
© 2018 Wilmington Compliance Week | 129 Portland St Fl 6 | Boston, MA 02114-1908
